After your first successful login, you will need to change your password. Once completed, please refer to the e-mail received from \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Auto EPM-TMC Notify \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(\\\"Welcome to EPAM!\\\") for further instructions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":144589,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/81dc856e-5b1d-4b49-8167-ae1c95b84b68/ema2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/81dc856e-5b1d-4b49-8167-ae1c95b84b68/ema2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"ema2.PNG\",\"name\":\"ema2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"81dc856e-5b1d-4b49-8167-ae1c95b84b68\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":399,\"height\":400},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is important that you remember your domain password and be aware that you will have to change it every three (3) months\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TWO-FACTOR AUTHENTICATION TOOL \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Two-factor authentication (2FA)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - an additional layer of authentication beyond a username/password. 2FA implies something you know (EPAM domain password) and something you have with you to prevent somebody from simply “knowing” your password and accessing your data. When 2FA is enabled, you still enter your EPAM Login Username and password or use SSO. However, you should additionally pass second-factor authentication to access the application. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2FA application does not replace your username and password. It is simply an added layer of security on top of your existing credentials. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IMPORTANT! You will be invited to set up 2-step verification: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Microsoft Multi-Factor Authentication. To be able to manage your EPAM account, enroll in EPAM Password Portal as described in the following article: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?kbLinkId=KM0343\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Registration in EPAM Password Portal\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rPASSWORD REQUIREMENTS AND RULES OF USE\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Domain password\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is valid for 90 days, after which you need to change it. The password cannot be changed earlier than 14 days since the last change/reset. The new password must not be the same as any of your previous 10 passwords in any corporate systems\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rDomain User Account \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is locked if a user enters invalid passwords for more than 50 consecutive times in 15 minutes. This is to prevent hackers from guessing Company passwords by entering random characters continuously. The locked-out account cannot be used until it is reset by the Support Team or until the 30 minutes of lockout duration for the account has expired. To mitigate the risk of fast unlocking, a special message is sent to the employee to verify wrong password usage or update the password on all devices trying to logon\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rYour domain password must meet the following requirements:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You cannot use a password that is the same as one of your previous 10 passwords\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All passwords, including temporary passwords, should be at least 9 alphanumeric characters\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The password should fulfill at least three of the following four character groups:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English uppercase characters (A-Z)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English lowercase characters (a-z)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Numerals (0-9)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Non-alphabetical characters (!, $, #,%)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The password should not contain common words or parts of the User ID and should not be easily guessable (i.e. based on information that can easily be guessed or found in the employee’s personal profile in UPSA/Telescope, e.g.: name, telephone number, date of birth etc.)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The password should not be vulnerable to dictionary attacks (i.e. do not consist of words included in dictionaries)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The password should be free of consecutive, identical, all-numeric or all-alphabetic characters\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
